None.Name: Gifted Branding
None.Description: Activate to mark the targeted enemy, disable its special abilities and force it move at walk speed only. All ranged attackers within a 65m radius will focus their attacks on marked target while their attack range are increased by 15m. Lasts for 15 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Tainted Branding
None.Description: Activate to mark the targeted enemy and make it take 15% more damage. All ranged attackers within a 65m radius will focus their attacks on the marked target while their attack range is increased by 15m. Lasts for 15 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points. (15% lifesteal)
